numlitem.para: Automatic Dependent Surveillance-Broadcast (ADS-B) is considered inoperative, and

note.para: Two additional deferrals required – Automatic Dependent Surveillance-Broadcast (ADS-B) System – ADS-B Applications and Traffic Alert Collision Avoidance System (TCAS II) – (EFB Installed or EFB Not Installed).

numlitem.para: Operate TCAS in transponder-only mode by selecting TCAS Mode Selector to XPNDR position.
Flight Control to ensure TCAS is not required by Foreign States along planned route.
Merging & Spacing and CAVS operations are prohibited.

placard.para: Placard adjacent to affected TCAS/VSI indicator "INOP".
Placard ADS-B "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
Placard TCAS "INOP" and enter item in Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Deactivate and secure the system by opening and collaring the TCAS circuit breaker.
